casebody.data:
CENTERVILLE
v.
KNAB 2019-0873 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., dissent.

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW.

Appeal accepted on proposition of law No. I.

Kennedy, French, and Fischer, JJ., would accept the appeal on both propositions of law.
